I asked From private conversations with Microsoft employees closer to product development, I've heard a fair bit of grumbling about swelling middle management and a priority of hiring more MBAs or sales people than technical staff. I'm still hearing those grumblings today. I must wonder about the question in reverse: If Steve Ballmer puts more engineers in place, will that cause disruptive cultural conflict with the sales and marketing hierarchy? Why
